Author: WastedShadow
Text: I feel you... I am currently unemployed and omg. It's so hard to keep yourself busy all day long. I don't really have tips or tricks... But you're definitely not alone.

Author: xsdylas
Text: I was unexpectedly let go from my last job about a year ago. I decided it was a sign I needed to finish my degree, so I'm doing that, but man, even with schoolwork it is hard to fill the time. Not to scare you, but I definitely gained weight from it. Make a "job" out of applying for jobs and hold yourself to a schedule. It's easy to fill the hours with snacking. :(
